overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "Hot Lunch" — It's lunch time and these two macho studs know exactly what they want to eat.  "Soccer Games" — After checking out this hunk's muscular body, one of his teammates has a fantasy that quickly turns into reality... with these two studs getting it on in the lockerroom, the shower, and even in the Jacuzzi!  "End Up" — It's closing time at the EndUp. As clean-up progresses, spirits are revived and the two bartenders start to enjoy some after-hours pleasures.
title: Hot Lunch
